word_mean: 青霉素：一大类天然或半合成的抗生素，直接或间接源于青霉菌属真菌，或其它生活于泥土中、并在特殊培养基中生长的真菌株，通过干扰细菌壁物质肽葡聚糖的最后合成阶段而发挥其对敏感细菌的杀菌及抑菌作用。尽管青霉素对宿主的毒性作用相对地低，但对许多细菌有强力的杀灭和抑制作用，特别是对革兰氏阳性致病菌(链球菌、葡萄球菌、肺炎球菌)、梭状芽胞杆菌、某些革兰阴性菌(淋球菌、脑膜炎球菌)、某些螺旋体(苍白密螺旋体和细弱密螺旋体)和某些真菌。有些靶细菌(如葡萄球菌)的某些株可分泌青霉素酶，使青霉素失活，对其抗菌作用有耐药性

sentence.Network_en: I should have asked him for a shot of penicillin.
sentence.Network_cn: 我应当让他给我打一针青霉素的.

sentence.Network_en: She injected the patient with penicillin.
sentence.Network_cn: 她给病人注射了青霉素.

sentence.Network_en: Penicillin was an extremely significant medical discovery.
sentence.Network_cn: 青霉素是极其重要的医学发现.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 青霉素是从青霉菌发酵液中提取的一青霉素(penicillin)种β-内酰胺抗生素。用它来治疗银屑病的作用机制是干扰细菌细胞壁的合成，使 …
盘尼西林（Penicillin）和其衍生物对胎儿无害，而磺胺类（Sulfanilamid）亦无影响，但预产期前短期内不要使用，因为会导致新生儿 …
most S. pneumoniae isolates were at least intermediately resistant to penicillin , and 10.1 % of H. influenzae showed beta-lactamase activity .大多数S.肺炎隔离群对青霉素的抵抗都致少居中，并且10.1％的H.流感显示了β-内酰胺酶活性。
中国化工企业联盟 ... 氨苄西林 Ampicillin Trihydrate 青霉素钠 penicillin D-甘露醇 D-Mannitol.

derivation.yuyuan_name: from the modern Latin genus name Penicillium (from Latin penicillum 'paintbrush') + -in

entry.def: Penicillin is a drug that kills bacteria and is used to treat infections.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various antibiotics obtained from penicillium molds (or produced synthetically) and used in the treatment of various infections and diseases

example.en: Man, this Jewish penicillin is okay.

auth_sentence.content: I have also been warned to never take penicillin.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have also been warned to never take penicillin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have also been warned to never take penicillin.

auth_sentence.content: If I have pneumonia I would certainly take penicillin.
auth_sentence.res_content: If I have pneumonia I would certainly take penicillin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If I have pneumonia I would certainly take penicillin.

auth_sentence.content: Just look at penicillin or the polio vaccine.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just look at penicillin or the polio vaccine.

sentences.en: Fleming discovered penicillin by accident in 1928.
sentences.cn: 弗莱明在1928年偶然发现了青霉素。

sentences.en: I should have asked him for a shot of penicillin.
sentences.cn: 我应当让他给我打一针青霉素的。

sentences.en: She injected the patient with penicillin.
sentences.cn: 她给病人注射了青霉素。

sentences.en: Penicillin cured him of his pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 青霉素治好了他的肺炎。
